entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
